DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare overall survival patient stage IIIB IV recurrent non-small cell lung cancer treat gemcitabine carboplatin v gemcitabine paclitaxel v paclitaxel carboplatin . - Compare overall response rate time progression patient treat regimen . - Compare toxic effect regimens patient . - Compare quality life patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord weight loss within past 6 month ( less 5 % v least 5 % ) , disease stage ( IIIB v IV ) , brain metastasis ( present v absent ) . Patients randomize 1 3 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 carboplatin IV 15-30 minute day 1 . - Arm II : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 paclitaxel IV 3 hour day 1 . - Arm III : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour carboplatin IV 15-30 minute day 1 . In arm , treatment repeat every 3 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , every 6 week study treatment , every 3 month progressive disease document . Patients follow every 3 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 1,134 patient ( 378 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 2 year .
